task_specification.description: Integrate TurnCounter into orchestrator's execute_step method to increment on each agent call iteration and persist to step file. This step ensures turn counting happens during actual command execution.
acceptance_criteria: DESOrchestrator.execute_step() initializes TurnCounter at phase start
Counter increments on each sub-agent invocation loop iteration
Turn count persisted to phase_execution_log.turn_count field in real-time
Counter state restored from step file on orchestrator resume
Turn counting ACTIVATES when /nw:execute or /nw:develop invoked
